story.storykicker: NCERT is hiring for various positions, apply now.
story.storybody:
The National Council of Educational Research and Training (NCERT) has issued a notification inviting applications for recruitment to various posts.

Vacancy details:

Total posts: 18

Name of the posts:

Junior Project Fellows 11
Computer Typist 3
DTP Operators 4

Eligibility criteria:

Educational qualifications:

Junior Project Fellows: The candidates interested in applying for the post should have a Masterï¿½??s degree in science/social science/education/ mathematics/statistics/ Hindi/ English/ child development with a minimum of 55 per cent marks.

They should also have proficiency in working on Computers.

Computer Typist: Those interested in this post should have passed class 12 under the 10 + 2 pattern or equivalent examination from a recognised Central/State/Board/institution.

The candidates should have good typing speed in both English and Hindi.

DTP Operators: The candidate should be a graduate in any discipline from a recognised university.

They should also have done one year diploma/certificate course in desk Top Publishing from a recognised institute.

Age limit:

Junior Project Fellows The maximum age of the candidate should be less than 40 years.

Computer Typist The maximum age of the candidate should preferably be less than 30 years

DTP Operators The maximum age of the candidate should preferably be less than 30 years.

Selection procedure:

Junior Project Fellows: The candidates will be selected on the basis of an interview.

Computer Typist and DTP Operators: The candidates will be selected on the basis of typing test.

Pay scale:

Junior Project Fellows: The candidates who have qualified NET will draw a consolidated salary of Rs 16,000 per month, while for the non-NET candidates the salary will be of Rs 14,000 per month.

Computer Typist: The candidates who passed class 12 (10+2) will draw a consolidated salary of 11,154 per month, while for graduate candidates the salary will be Rs 12,142 per month.

DTP Operators: The selected candidates will draw a salary of Rs 23,000 per month.

How to apply:

Junior Project Fellows: Eligible, interested candidates have to attend the walk-in interview with resume/bio data along with original and self-attested photocopies of each certificate and other required documents.

Computer Typist and DTP Operators: The candidates will have to appear for the test along with bio data along with original and self-attested photocopies of each certificate and other required documents.

Important dates:

Junior Project Fellows: Date and time of interview June 13, 14, 2016 at 11 am
Computer Typist: Date and time of interview June 03, 2016
DTP Operators: Date and time of interview June 13, 2016

For information on more latest government jobs, click here.
